Entries.Utility.cs.5371: @... Zack... #$b# As the mayor of Pelican Town, and regional bearer of the matrimonial seal, I now pronounce you husband and wife!$h
Entries.Utility.cs.5377: @... Zack... #$b# As the mayor of Pelican Town, and regional bearer of the matrimonial seal, I now pronounce you wife and..., well, wife!$h
Entries.Utility.cs.5367: When @ first arrived in Pelican Town, no one knew if he'd fit in with our community...#$b#But from this day forward, @ is going to be as much a part of this town as any of us!$h#$b#It is my great honor on this day {0} of {1}, to unite @ and Zack in the bonds of marriage.
Entries.Utility.cs.5369: When @ first arrived in Pelican Town, no one knew if she'd fit in with our community...#$b#But from this day forward, @ is going to be as much a part of this town as any of us!$h#$b#It is my great honor on this day {0} of {1}, to unite @ and Zack in the bonds of marriage.

Entries.Zack: Aye Pam is a sneaky one isn't she.
I wish the world would pick a season, spring is gone already.
Should ask SpongeBob for his net,I'm only joking.
Do you know where I come from? ha ha I know my fate if I go back.
Why are people afraid of the clown? He just ugly.
Pft this is scary? They should see Pam's feet.
Entries.Zack_spouse: Where I'm from, this is like a tutorial level of scary.

Entries.Zack: Wanna get outta here with me? *wink*
Pam got the biggest jug lugs I've seen so far around here,gross.
You will get your gift tonight. *wink*

I mean if you really wanted to.."/emote farmer 16/jump farmer/faceDirection farmer 2/emote farmer 60/animate Zack false true 330 30 31 30 31/speak Zack "What I mean is uh..You could polish my sword anytime,if I had it with me."/stopAnimation Zack/showFrame Zack 29/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 500/speak Zack "I like you, a lot. And I.."/pause 500/speak Zack "I'm just..maybe..*sigh*"/faceDirection farmer 2/emote farmer 60/faceDirection farmer 0/speak Zack "I just never thought it'd come to this with my feelings about someone."/pause 500/speak Zack "I'll come visit you today at your place..after dark though.
